evidence.claim: eni utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data exchange.
X12 transactions are supported for healthcare billing processing.
HL7 standards are adhered to within their interfacing solutions.
Eni is expanding its cloud capabilities with partnerships in GCP and Azure.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or use cases related to healthcare data exchange found.
